lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question, Why doesn't Aunt Jennifer tell anyone how
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题，为什么珍妮弗阿姨不告诉任何人她

lyrics.text: My Aunt Jennifer is an actress.
lyrics.translation: 我的姑姑詹妮弗是一位演员。

lyrics.text: She must be at least 35 years old.
In spite of this, she often appears on the stage as a young girl.
lyrics.translation: 尽管如此，她经常在舞台上扮演一个年轻女孩。

lyrics.text: Jennifer will have to take part in a new play soon.
lyrics.translation: Jennifer 很快将不得不参加一部新剧。

lyrics.text: This time she will be a girl of 17.
lyrics.translation: 这一次她将会是一个17岁的女孩。

lyrics.text: In the play, she must appear in a bright red dress and long black stockings.
lyrics.translation: 在剧中，她必须穿着鲜红色的裙子和黑色的长筒袜。

lyrics.text: Last year in another play, she had to wear short socks and a bright orange colored dress.
lyrics.translation: 去年在另一部戏剧中，她不得不穿短袜和一件鲜艳的橙色裙子。

lyrics.text: If anyone ever asks her how old she is, she always answers,
lyrics.translation: 如果有人问她多大了，她总是回答，

lyrics.text: Darling, it must be terrible to be grown up.
lyrics.translation: 亲爱的，长大成人一定很可怕。
